title: nArAyaNa namada
sahitya:
nArAyaNa namada santatam vArAShi shayanam hIrAngadayutam


anupallavi

  mArAri vinutam munijana vinatamdhArAdhara nibhatanam shubha caritam


caraNam    vAsudEvam ambuja lOcanam dAsavarya pApa vimOcanam 
vAsavAdyAkhila sura krta namanam bhAsurEndu vadanam brta bhuvanam
